name: Black Opal Ventures
locations_freeform: New York, New York. Minneapolis, Minnesota. Hartford, Connecticut. Calgary. San Francisco Bay Area. Boston / New England; 5th Floor Warwick House, 25 Buckingham Palace Road, London SW1W 0PP
description: Black Opal Ventures is a firm founded by seasoned investors and operators Tara Bishop and Eileen Tanghal. They aim to bring rare, everlasting value to entrepreneurs and investors by identifying and elevating technology start-ups with purposes that go beyond business. The firm focuses on disrupting industries, removing barriers, and closing the gender and diversity gap in the venture capital industry.

investment_verticals.2: Health IT, Medical Devices, BioTech, Health & Hospital Services, Digital Health, Logistics, Pharmaceuticals, FinTech
